tasks.label: Check E2E Workflow Runs
tasks.command: gh run list --workflow="E2E Tests with Screenshots" --limit=5

tasks.label: Trigger E2E Workflow
tasks.command: gh workflow run "E2E Tests with Screenshots"

tasks.label: Check Latest Workflow Runs
tasks.command: gh run list --workflow="E2E Tests with Screenshots" --limit=3

tasks.label: Check Workflow Status
tasks.command: gh run list --workflow="E2E Tests with Screenshots" --limit=2

tasks.label: Test Fixed Workflow
tasks.command: gh workflow run "E2E Tests with Screenshots"

tasks.label: Trigger E2E Workflow Again
tasks.command: gh workflow run "E2E Tests with Screenshots"

tasks.label: Check Latest Runs
tasks.command: gh run list --workflow="E2E Tests with Screenshots" --limit=3

tasks.label: Wait and Check Run Status
tasks.command: sleep 60 && gh run list --workflow="E2E Tests with Screenshots" --limit=2

tasks.label: Check Final Status
tasks.command: gh run list --workflow="E2E Tests with Screenshots" --limit=2
